column2: "If you head north from this town, you'll find a cave. If you go through that cave, you'll reach Central City."
"I sometimes do some joint training with the Central ARKS. We're always trying to show off to each other, it's great fun."
"Do you want to join us some time?"
"I go over to Central City every once in a while. It's really built-up, very urban."
"I like it better here, though. We have this great ocean view, and the sea breeze feels really nice on your skin."
